dict.acceptation: 量度；份量，尺寸；测量法；（量得的）尺寸；

sent.orig: Measurement & Automation Explorer software from National Instruments.
sent.trans: 美国国家仪器公司的测量&自动化浏览器软件(Measurement&AutomationExplorersoftwarefromNationalInstruments)。

sent.orig: For example, reaction electric potential measurement, microwave measurement, capacitance measurement, ultrasonic measurement, laser measurement, etc.
sent.trans: 比如感应电势法、微波法、电容法、超声法、激光法等等。

sent.orig: It also applies to Solar Cell measurement, Flexible Display Measurement, Hall Effect Measurement, and customized measurement.
sent.trans: 太阳能电池薄膜量测；软性显示面板量测；霍尔效应量测；以及客制化的量测需求。

sent.orig: Less measurement points and burdensome operation make most of strain measurement instruments unfit for automatic measurement.
sent.trans: 当前的应变测试仪器普遍存在测点少、操作繁杂、不利于测试工作自动化等缺点。

sent.orig: Magnetic parameters measurement technology refers to magnetic field strength measurement and magnetic flux measurement.
sent.trans: 磁参数测量指的是磁场强度和磁通的测量。
